author: Ted Byrne
content:
This is ALMOST among the two or three of your very best images(two of which I proudly own). What holds it back for me (and remember, I'm quibbling here about a masterpiece) is the darkening on the left. Now normally I try not to get into a technical review. But since this is an abstract it is driven by things technical. I wish you'd allow some more highlights to escape in those areas to better balance the work, otherwise it seems to tumble off my monitor on the heavy side.

Again, I am really quite moved by the power of this piece but it is as if you've not quite resolved a melody.

Ted
